name: Vegan Gluten Free Chocolate Chip Cookies
description: These Vegan Gluten Free Chocolate Chip Cookies are lower in sugar than most, high in protein, and ultra delicious! Simple to make in just 1 bowl, 8 everyday ingredients and 20 minutes.
recipeIngredient: 1  flax egg (1 tablespoon ground flaxseed mixed with 2.5 tablespoons water)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
recipeInstructions.name: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the flax egg: In a small bowl, combine 1 tablespoon ground flax with 2.5 tablespoons warm water. Let sit for a few minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the flax egg: In a small bowl, combine 1 tablespoon ground flax with 2.5 tablespoons warm water. Let sit for a few minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Cream together brown sugar and coconut oil with a wooden spoon in a large bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Cream together brown sugar and coconut oil with a wooden spoon in a large bowl.

recipeInstructions.text: Add baking soda, salt, vanilla and the flax egg. Mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add baking soda, salt, vanilla and the flax egg. Mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the almond flour to the bowl and mix until combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the almond flour to the bowl and mix until combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Scoop the dough by heaping tablespoons and roll into about 12 balls. Place onto prepared baking sheet and flatten slightly with your hand.
recipeInstructions.name: Scoop the dough by heaping tablespoons and roll into about 12 balls. Place onto prepared baking sheet and flatten slightly with your hand.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 10-12 minutes. Let cool for at least 10 minutes before moving to cooling rack or eating. They will firm up a bit as they sit. Store in a covered container for 3-4 days at room temperature, or longer in the refrigerator.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 10-12 minutes. Let cool for at least 10 minutes before moving to cooling rack or eating. They will firm up a bit as they sit. Store in a covered container for 3-4 days at room temperature, or longer in the refrigerator.

keywords: gluten free cookies, healthy vegan desserts
